original_text: Next year, Elkanah went to Shiloh to offer sacrifices to the Lord, as he had promised to do. His family went with him.
korean_text: 그 사람 엘가나와 그의 온 집이 여호와께 매년제와 서원제를 드리러 올라갈 때에

sentences.original_text: Next year, Elkanah went to Shiloh
to offer sacrifices to the Lord
as he had promised to do
